# year

**Instance Property**

The number of years.

## Declaration

```swift
var year: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

This value is interpreted in the context of the calendar with which it is used—see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/DatesAndTimes/Articles/dtCalendars.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40003470] in [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/DatesAndTimes/DatesAndTimes.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/10000039i].

## Accessing Years and Months

- **era**: The number of eras.
- **yearForWeekOfYear**: The ISO 8601 week-numbering year.
- **quarter**: The number of quarters.
- **month**: The number of months.
- **isLeapMonth**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the month is a leap month.
